item.title: ⁣⁣GIDA partners with AAX Exchange – I Can Trade
item.dc:creator: ginakev
item.description:
⁣⁣⁣GIDA has just partners with AAX Exchange to run a 2 days FREE Crypto Trading Class. ⁣⁣See the tweet >> https://twitter.com/aax9ja/status/1514528041082490880…⁣⁣ 𝗔𝗔𝗫 𝘄𝗶𝗹𝗹 𝗯𝗲 equally be 𝗿𝘂𝗻𝗻𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗮 $𝟭𝟬 𝗮𝗶𝗿𝗱𝗿𝗼𝗽 𝘁𝗼 𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘆𝗼𝗻𝗲 𝘄𝗵𝗼 𝘀𝗶𝗴𝗻𝘀 𝘂𝗽 𝘁𝗼 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗲𝘅𝗰𝗵𝗮𝗻𝗴𝗲 𝘂𝘀𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗚𝗜𝗗𝗔’𝘀 𝗹𝗶𝗻𝗸, 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗽𝗮𝗿𝘁𝗶𝗰𝗶𝗽𝗮𝘁𝗲𝘀 𝗶𝗻 𝘁𝗵𝗶𝘀 𝗰𝗹𝗮𝘀𝘀.⁣⁣⁣ Here is the special link to register with;⁣⁣⁣ https://www.aax.com/invite/sign-up?inviteCode=M888nLi9QgLm2⁣...

The post ⁣⁣GIDA partners with AAX Exchange – I Can Trade first appeared on Ginakev Digital Academy.
item.content:encoded:
⁣⁣⁣GIDA has just partners with AAX Exchange to run a 2 days FREE Crypto Trading Class.

⁣⁣See the tweet >> https://twitter.com/aax9ja/status/1514528041082490880…⁣⁣

𝗔𝗔𝗫 𝘄𝗶𝗹𝗹 𝗯𝗲 equally be 𝗿𝘂𝗻𝗻𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗮 $𝟭𝟬 𝗮𝗶𝗿𝗱𝗿𝗼𝗽 𝘁𝗼 𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘆𝗼𝗻𝗲 𝘄𝗵𝗼 𝘀𝗶𝗴𝗻𝘀 𝘂𝗽 𝘁𝗼 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗲𝘅𝗰𝗵𝗮𝗻𝗴𝗲 𝘂𝘀𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗚𝗜𝗗𝗔’𝘀 𝗹𝗶𝗻𝗸, 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗽𝗮𝗿𝘁𝗶𝗰𝗶𝗽𝗮𝘁𝗲𝘀 𝗶𝗻 𝘁𝗵𝗶𝘀 𝗰𝗹𝗮𝘀𝘀.⁣⁣⁣

Here is the special link to register with;⁣⁣⁣

https://www.aax.com/invite/sign-up?inviteCode=M888nLi9QgLm2⁣

Sign-up, verify and do your KYC, deposit $20 and fill the form. You’ll get a $10 bonus for trading futures and you can withdraw the profits.⁣⁣⁣Fill this form after signing up to prepare for the class, and ensure you qualify to receive the $10 airdrop;⁣⁣

bit.ly/GIDAEasterBonus⁣

The post ⁣⁣GIDA partners with AAX Exchange – I Can Trade first appeared on Ginakev Digital Academy.

item.title: Technext Recognizes Ezemmuo Blockchain – Founder & CEO of GIDA
item.dc:creator: ginakev
item.description:
𝗧𝗲𝗰𝗵𝗡𝗲𝘅𝘁, a leading media outfit interviewed Mr Okoye kevin Chibuoyim, the Founder and CEO of GIDA. Okoye Kevin founded GIDA that has gone on to train 1500+ students across the country | •He organised the first-ever Blockchain conference in Southeast, Nigeria | •Kevin and his team look forward to providing Africa and beyond, crypto education...

The post Technext Recognizes Ezemmuo Blockchain – Founder & CEO of GIDA first appeared on Ginakev Digital Academy.
item.content:encoded:
𝗧𝗲𝗰𝗵𝗡𝗲𝘅𝘁, a leading media outfit interviewed Mr Okoye kevin Chibuoyim, the Founder and CEO of GIDA.

Okoye Kevin founded GIDA that has gone on to train 1500+ students across the country | •He organised the first-ever Blockchain conference in Southeast, Nigeria | •Kevin and his team look forward to providing Africa and beyond, crypto education and insightful trading skills.

“At first, I felt like giving up, as that was my life savings. But I decided not to give up easily. I was bitten more than once and broken, but said, “I must learn this thing.”

~Ezemmuo Blockchain

Read the full interview here;

https://technext.ng/…/how-ezemmuo-blockchain-is…/

The post Technext Recognizes Ezemmuo Blockchain – Founder & CEO of GIDA first appeared on Ginakev Digital Academy.

item.title: GIDA launches “Community Limelight” and Weekly Giveaway Program to appreciate the community.
item.dc:creator: ginakev
item.description:
GIDA launches it’s Community Limelight program to appreciate the community. Every week, Ginakev Digital Academy(GIDA) would be recognising and rewarding it’s Outstanding Community members who actively participate in the community Telegram and social media with engagements. 𝗕𝗲 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗠𝗼𝘀𝘁 𝗔𝗰𝘁𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝗠𝗲𝗺𝗯𝗲𝗿 𝗶𝗻 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗧𝗲𝗹𝗲𝗴𝗿𝗮𝗺 𝗚𝗿𝗼𝘂𝗽 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝘄𝗲𝗲𝗸, 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝗴𝗲𝘁 𝗿𝗲𝗰𝗼𝗴𝗻𝗶𝘇𝗲𝗱 𝗼𝗻 𝗮𝗹𝗹 𝗼𝘂𝗿...

The post GIDA launches “Community Limelight” and Weekly Giveaway Program to appreciate the community. first appeared on Ginakev Digital Academy.
item.content:encoded:
GIDA launches it’s Community Limelight program to appreciate the community.

Every week, Ginakev Digital Academy(GIDA) would be recognising and rewarding it’s Outstanding Community members who actively participate in the community Telegram and social media with engagements.

𝗕𝗲 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗠𝗼𝘀𝘁 𝗔𝗰𝘁𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝗠𝗲𝗺𝗯𝗲𝗿 𝗶𝗻 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗧𝗲𝗹𝗲𝗴𝗿𝗮𝗺 𝗚𝗿𝗼𝘂𝗽 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝘄𝗲𝗲𝗸, 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝗴𝗲𝘁 𝗿𝗲𝗰𝗼𝗴𝗻𝗶𝘇𝗲𝗱 𝗼𝗻 𝗮𝗹𝗹 𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝘀𝗼𝗰𝗶𝗮𝗹 𝗺𝗲𝗱𝗶𝗮 𝗮𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗖𝗼𝗺𝗺𝘂𝗻𝗶𝘁𝘆 𝗟𝗶𝗺𝗲𝗹𝗶𝗴𝗵𝘁 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝘄𝗲𝗲𝗸. 𝗬𝗼𝘂 𝗲𝗾𝘂𝗮𝗹𝗹𝘆 𝗴𝗲𝘁 𝘁𝗼 𝗪𝗶𝗻 𝗡𝟱,𝟬𝟬𝟬!!

To Participate:

Join Our TG Group – t.me/OfficialGIDAChat

Join Our TG Channel –t.me/OfficialGIDA

Follow us on Twitter:https://twitter.com/Official_GIDA

Rules :

– Attend all Our Sessions and activities.

– Have highest number of interaction in the community Telegram Group for the week.

– Raise good conversations and give nice replies to posts.

– Spamming the group chat with fake and useless posts disqualifies you.

𝗪𝗶𝗻𝗻𝗲𝗿𝘀 𝘄𝗼𝘂𝗹𝗱 𝗯𝗲 𝗽𝗶𝗰𝗸𝗲𝗱 𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘆 𝗦𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗱𝗮𝘆 𝗳𝗼𝗹𝗹𝗼𝘄𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗳𝗿𝗼𝗺 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗧𝗲𝗹𝗲𝗴𝗿𝗮𝗺 𝗚𝗿𝗼𝘂𝗽 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝘁𝗶𝘀𝘁𝗶𝗰𝘀 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝘄𝗲𝗲𝗸, 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝘄𝗶𝗻𝗻𝗲𝗿𝘀 𝗮𝗻𝗻𝗼𝘂𝗻𝗰𝗲𝗱 𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘆 𝗦𝘂𝗻𝗱𝗮𝘆 𝗼𝗻 𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗦𝗼𝗰𝗶𝗮𝗹 𝗠𝗲𝗱𝗶𝗮.

The post GIDA launches “Community Limelight” and Weekly Giveaway Program to appreciate the community. first appeared on Ginakev Digital Academy.
